title: Why is Spear of Shojin still in the game?
body:
Seriously, I'm sick of this item. If I wanted to play URF mode I'd just play URF mo-....oh wait, Riot still hasn't made that gamemode permanent :/

Still, URF mode cooldowns deserves to stay in URF mode, I've played with, as and against far too many {{champion:24}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:236}} to know that Shojin is beyond stupid, even if it isn't picked up 100% of the time. 

This item never deserved to be let loose onto Summoner's Rift, it needs to be vaulted.

Okay, I’m with you - SoS in its current version is not healthy. But this is not an item that Lucian or Rengar build. It would be absolutely terrible on them. It’s really abused by 3 champions, and it’s arguable whether riven really abuses it because she already has absurdly low cooldowns through BC/DD. There’s no reason to make up non-sense to attempt to strengthen your argument - most people agree Shojin needs to be removed or changed drastically. 

As for suggestions for a change: I would propose something along the lines where you can only choose one ability that can have its cooldown reduced, not applying to every single non-ult spell.
